## gcloud.CloudRunProps.port property

Port on which the container will listen

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
port: number;
```

## Remarks

The container must listen on this port. There is no port mapping in CloudRun. However, this will set the `PORT` environment variable for the container, and so the container can listen on this port to get the effect of port mapping.
